valmo.geco
Class Geco

java.lang.Object
  valmo.geco.Geco
All Implemented Interfaces:
GecoRequestHandler
public class Geco
extends java.lang.Object
implements GecoRequestHandler

Geco is the main class, responsible for launching the application and managing the current stage. It also acts as a Facade between UI widgets and controls.

Since:
Jan 25, 2009
